scenario.name: UAC: Registration Scenario
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[domain] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port] To: <sip:[service]@[domain]> From: <sip:[service]@[domain]>;tag=[call_number] Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;transport=[transport] Expires: 5 Call-ID: reg-[service]:///[call_id] Supported: path Max-Forwards: 70 CSeq: 1 REGISTER Content-Length: 0
